welcome_message_body: Welcome to Tangier, Morocco! Explore the city's vibrant mix of cultures, bustling markets, and stunning coastline. Embrace the charm of this historic city and enjoy all that Tangier has to offer.

restaurants.name: El Tangerino
restaurants.description: El Tangerino is a diner located in طنجة.
restaurants.address: 186 Avenue Mohamed VI, Corniche de Tanger ((à coté du Luigi)), 90000 طنجة

restaurants.name: Restaurant el Achab
restaurants.description: Restaurant el Achab is a steakhouse located in the city.
restaurants.address: Avenue Prince Moulay Abdellah, Tanger, Morocco

restaurants.name: Le Saveur du Poisson
restaurants.description: Le Saveur du Poisson is a seafood restaurant located in طنجة.
restaurants.address: Escalier Waller 2 (Rue de la Liberté), طنجة

restaurants.name: Anna e Paolo
restaurants.description: Anna e Paolo is a italian restaurant located in طنجة.

restaurants.name: Chi Cafe & restaurant
restaurants.description: Chi Cafe & restaurant is a italian restaurant located in the city.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Boukhalef Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Boukhalef Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
